data: The organization Aurora Manufacturing Inc. is a company.
The organization Aurora Manufacturing Inc. operates primarily in the manufacturing industry.
The organization Aurora Manufacturing Inc. has aerospace as a secondary industry focus.
The organization Aurora Manufacturing Inc. has been a leader in precision engineering since 1980.
The organization Aurora Manufacturing Inc. specializes in aerospace components and industrial robotics.
The organization Aurora Manufacturing Inc. employs over 5,000 employees worldwide.
The organization Aurora Manufacturing Inc. is headquartered in Detroit, Michigan.
The organization Aurora Manufacturing Inc. is committed to quality, innovation, and sustainable solutions for global industries.
